variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-capture-tiny
dependencies.description: Capture STDOUT and STDERR from Perl, XS or external programs

dependencies.name: perl-email-address-xs
dependencies.description: Parse and format RFC 5322 email addresses and groups

dependencies.name: perl-email-simple
dependencies.description: Simple parsing of RFC2822 message format and headers

dependencies.name: perl-moo
dependencies.description: Moo - Minimalist Object Orientation (with Moose compatibility)

dependencies.name: perl-moox-types-mooselike
dependencies.description: Some Moosish types and a type builder

dependencies.name: perl-sub-exporter
dependencies.description: A sophisticated exporter for custom-built routines

dependencies.name: perl-throwable
dependencies.description: A role for classes that can be thrown

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
